title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services      There is no food or services at Manzanar.Lone Pine is eight miles south of Manzanar and has food, gas and lodging.Independence is six miles north of Manzanar and has food, gas and lodging.Lone Pine Services
